name: Player City Building Guide
raw: ------------------------------ Info ------------------------------ You can not buy ready-made houses. You have to build them using tradeskills. The store where all this is sold is Uncle Bazzit's Shop in Meetmedere (MMD). There are two types of buildings: advanced and regular ones. To make an advanced building you need to upgrade you #L "Regular Building Structure" "254807". The QL of the building ranges from 1-300 and is determined by #L "Generic Organic Immunity System" "254822". Uncle Bazzit only sells up to QL75. To find out how to make a higher QL, look further down in this guide. Advanced structures: Headquarter, Market, Guard House Regular Structures: Grid House, Notum Mining Operations, Notum Silo, Landing Pad, Satellite Uplink, ECM Tower, Swimming Pool, Sidewalk Cafe, Sky Bar ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Generic Volatile Nanobots" "247760" #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" #L "Blueprint - Regular Building Structure" "247768" #L "Floorplan - Clan Swimming Pool" "255481" #L "Generic Organic Immunity System" "254822" ------------------------------ Note:for a building of QL75+ you will need to build your own Generic Organic Immunity System and will also need: #L "Kyr'Ozch Structural Analyzer" "247100" #L "Solid Clump of Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material" "254804" #L "Advanced Bio-Comminutor" "154332" #L "Manteze Scout Nasal Membrane" "247762" ------------------------------ Note:for advanced buildings you will also need: #L "Fertilized Giant Chirop Egg" "247788" #L "Slow-Killing Poison" "247791" #L "Unrefined Notum Salt" "247786" #L "Uncle Bazzit's Bio-Mechanical AI" "247794" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Generic Organic Immunity System Note: To make a QL75+ building, regular or advanced, you need a #L "Solid Clump of Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material" "254804" and a #L "Manteze Scout Nasal Membrane" "247762". The QL of the Clump of Bio-Material sets the QL of the Generic Organic Immunity System (and the building). Kyr'Ozch Structural Analyzer + Solid Clump of Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material = #L "Kyr'Ozch Viral Serum" "254805" Skills: | 4.5 x QL EE | Note: Refining a clump of bio material does not guarantee viral serum as a result. They can turn into several different items. Advanced Bio-Comminutor + Manteze Scout Nasal Membrane = #L "Membrane Pulp" "247763" Skills: | 400 PH | Membrane Pulp + Kyr'Ozch Viral Serum = #L "Generic Organic Immunity System" "254822" Skills: | 3.5 x QL PH | Regular Building Generic Volatile Nanobots + HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate = #L "Strong Regenerating Bioplate" "247757" Skills: | 4x QL CH | Strong Regenerating Bioplate + Generic Organic Immunity System = #L "Superior Bioplate" "254806" Skills: | 400 PH | Blueprint - Regular Building Structure + Superior Bioplate = #L "Regular Building Structure" "254807" Skills: | 4 x QL ME | Note: for advanced structures, skip the next step Regular Building Structure + Floorplan - Clan Swimming Pool = #L "Clan Swimming Pool" "254164" Skills: | 5 x CL | Advanced Buildings Unrefined Notum Salt + Fertilized Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Mutating Giant Chirop Egg" "247789" Skills: | 400 PH | Slow-Killing Poison + Mutating Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Poisoned Giant Chirop Egg" "247790" Skills: | 400 CH | Advanced Bio-Comminutor + Poisoned Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Mutating Bio-Pulp" "247792" Skills: | 400 PH | Uncle Bazzit's Bio-Mechanical AI + Mutating Bio-Pulp = #L "Bio-Mechanical Computer" "247795" Skills: | 400 QFT | Bio-Mechanical Computer + Regular Building Structure = #L "Superior Building Structure" "254829" Skills: | 4 x QL ME | Floorplan - Clan Large Organization Headquarters + Superior Building Structure = #L "Large Clan Organization Headquarters" "254200" Skills: | 5 x QL CL | Alternative way of making Strong Regenerating Bioplate #L "Neutron Displacer" "149823" + #L "Stalker Carapace" "247817" = #L "Non-Regenerating Bioplate" "247755" #L "Advanced Bio-Comminutor" "154332" + #L "Rollerrat Queen Blood" "247758" = #L "Rollerrat Queen Erythrocyte" "247759" Rollerrat Queen Erythrocyte + Non-Regenerating Bioplate = #L "Strong Regenerating Bioplate" "247757"
